item.description:
Start preparing for Thanksgiving by brushing up on your knowledge of the Pilgrims.  This is the country's oldest continuously operating museum.  It tells the Pilgrims' story using displays, movies and paintings.  After the museum, we can visit Plymouth Rock and have an early supper on the waterfront.  Free parking is available behind the building.

Cost $8.00 for the museum, plus the cost of your meal if you stay for dinner.

If you're coming, please RSVP by 10:00 AM Saturday morning.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet Craig, our host, on the front steps on Court Street
item.name: A Pilgrim Adventure
